please_text: Aha hepfo andika inomero za dosiye yawe hamwe nï¿½urupfunguruzo kugirango umenye aho dosiye yawe igeze.
first_paragraph: Iyi ni site My Case ya RSC Africa izogufasha kurondera amakuru ajanye na dosiye y’iyimuka rwawe muri Reta zunze ubumwe z’ Amerika. Koresha uruhande rw’ibubamfu mu kugurura mu gushikira no mukwakira amakuru agezweho ya dosiye yawe.Wategerezwa kuba warahawe urupfunguruzo n’umukozi wa RSC Afrika yagukoresheje interiviyu ya mbere.
second_paragraph: Nimba waribagiwe urupfunguruza canke ukaba wipfuza guhindura urwo wurusanzwe ukoresha, fyonda kumuhora wanditse ko ngo “SABA KO URUPFUNGUZO RUHINDURWA” ibubamfu hanyuma uce ukurikiza amabwirizwa.
third_paragraph: Ukaba ufise ibindi bibazo bijanye na dosiye yawe, bijanye na RSC Africa canke bijanye na USRAP, urashobora kutwandikira kuri case@CWSAfrica.org. RSC Africa izogerageza kuguha inyishu mukiringo kiterenze iminsi 14.
fourth_paragraph: Umugambi wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika wo kujana impunzi kuba muri Amerika ukorwa ku buntu. Hagize uwugusaba amafaranga canke wiketse igiturire, bitumenyeshe kuri Fraud@CWSAfrica.org.
